00001 #pragma once
00002 
00003 typedef float m3x3Type[3][3];
00004 
00005 //! Simple matrix to support Triangle::getShadingNormal
00006 class Matrix3x3 {
00007 public:
00008         m3x3Type m;
00009         
00010         inline void Fill (float m00, float m01, float m02,
00011                                         float m10, float m11, float m12,
00012                                         float m20, float m21, float m22){
00013                 m[0][0] = m00;
00014                 m[0][1] = m01;
00015                 m[0][2] = m02;
00016 
00017                 m[1][0] = m10;
00018                 m[1][1] = m11;
00019                 m[1][2] = m12;
00020 
00021                 m[2][0] = m20;
00022                 m[2][1] = m21;
00023                 m[2][2] = m22;
00024         }
00025 
00026         inline void InvertMatrix3x3 (Matrix3x3& mA);
00027         inline void MultiplyMatrixLeft (const Vector* vIn, Vector* vOut);
00028 };
00029 
00030 
00031 void Matrix3x3::InvertMatrix3x3 (Matrix3x3& mA) 
00032 {
00033         m3x3Type& A = mA.m;
00034         
00035         // generated by maple  C(A_inv,optimized);       
00036         float           t4 = A[0][0]*A[1][1];
00037         float       t6 = A[0][0]*A[1][2];
00038         float       t8 = A[0][1]*A[1][0];
00039         float       t10 = A[0][2]*A[1][0];
00040         float       t12 = A[0][1]*A[2][0];
00041         float       t14 = A[0][2]*A[2][0];
00042         float       t17 = 1/(t4*A[2][2]-t6*A[2][1]-t8*A[2][2]+t10*A[2][1]+t12*A[1][2]-t14*A[1][1]);
00043         
00044         m[0][0] = (A[1][1]*A[2][2]-A[1][2]*A[2][1])*t17;
00045         m[0][1] = -(A[0][1]*A[2][2]-A[0][2]*A[2][1])*t17;
00046         m[0][2] = -(-A[0][1]*A[1][2]+A[0][2]*A[1][1])*t17;
00047         m[1][0] = -(A[1][0]*A[2][2]-A[1][2]*A[2][0])*t17;
00048         m[1][1] = (A[0][0]*A[2][2]-t14)*t17;
00049         m[1][2] = -(t6-t10)*t17;
00050         m[2][0] = -(-A[1][0]*A[2][1]+A[1][1]*A[2][0])*t17;
00051         m[2][1] = -(A[0][0]*A[2][1]-t12)*t17;
00052         m[2][2] = (t4-t8)*t17;
00053 }
00054 
00055 //! vOut = Matrix * vIn,  matrix is on the left side
00056 inline void Matrix3x3::MultiplyMatrixLeft (const Vector* vIn, Vector* vOut)
00057 {
00058         vOut->x = vIn->x * m[0][0] + vIn->y * m[0][1] + vIn->z * m[0][2];
00059         vOut->y = vIn->x * m[1][0] + vIn->y * m[1][1] + vIn->z * m[1][2];
00060         vOut->z = vIn->x * m[2][0] + vIn->y * m[2][1] + vIn->z * m[2][2];
00061 }
